meta.name: Route and reassign leads with SLA using Google Sheets and Slack

name: Lead Routing Engine with SLA Auto-Reassignment

nodes.name: STAGE) Update lead stage to CONTACTED
STAGE) Authorize click (must be assigned sales)

parameters.content:
## SLA-Based Lead Routing & Auto Reassignment Workflow

This workflow implements an SLA-based lead routing system designed to ensure fast response times and prevent lead neglect through automated reassignment and escalation.

When a new lead is submitted, the workflow immediately assigns it to a sales representative using a round-robin distribution. This ensures fair workload allocation across the sales team and avoids manual lead picking.

A 1-hour SLA threshold is applied after each assignment. If the lead remains in the ‚ÄúNEW‚Äù stage and has not been contacted within this timeframe, the system automatically re-routes the lead to the next available sales representative in a circular order.

The SLA duration can be adjusted easily by modifying the Schedule Trigger configuration.

While this implementation uses Google Sheets as a lightweight operational datastore and Slack as the interaction layer, the same logic can be adapted to other databases or CRM platforms (such as Salesforce, HubSpot, or PostgreSQL).

A scheduled process periodically scans the lead database and identifies leads that meet the following conditions:

a) Lead stage is NEW
b) No contact activity has occurred within the SLA window

Qualified leads are automatically re-assigned, and Slack notifications are sent to the newly assigned sales representative with an interactive ‚ÄúMark as CONTACTED‚Äù action.

To maintain operational safety:

a) Only the currently assigned sales representative is allowed to update the lead status
b) Stage updates are idempotent, preventing duplicate or accidental re-processing
c) Repeated SLA breaches trigger a one-time escalation to a manager, ensuring visibility without notification spam

This workflow helps improve response speed, enforces consistent follow-up behavior, and introduces operational discipline without requiring a full CRM system.

main.node: STAGE) Update lead stage to CONTACTED
STAGE) Authorize click (must be assigned sales)
